duration.description: The time required for the rolling process, in ms
duration.description_zh: 滚动过程所需的时间，单位ms

autoplay.description: Whether or not to start scrolling automatically

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to display is described above
decimals.description_zh: 要显示的小数位数，见上方说明

use-easing.description: At the end of the scroll, whether to ease the end is explained above
use-easing.description_zh: 滚动结束时，是否缓动结尾，见上方说明

separator.description_zh: 千位分隔符，见上方说明

events.name: end
events.description: Triggers when the value scrolls to the target value
events.description_zh: 数值滚动到目标值时触发

methods.name: start
methods.description: When autoplay is false, scrolling is initiated via this method
methods.description_zh: autoplay为false时，通过此方法启动滚动

methods.name: reStart
methods.description: Pause and restart scrolling (start scrolling from the value before the pause)
methods.description_zh: 暂停后重新开始滚动(从暂停前的值开始滚动)
